'''Sensors''': *Passive: 15/0D *Scan: 20/1D *Search: 30/1D+2 '''Description''': The Action IV transport was a Corellian Engineering Corporation medium bulk freighter of the Action series. It had a trapezoidal shape and was roughly 100 meters in length. Internally, its holds could be adapted to various pressures and climates with individual configurations. Even though each ship was sold without any weaponry or defensive shields built in, plenty of after-market systems could be added to the Action IV. During the time of the Galactic Republic, the Action IV transport Azure Queen was captured by Black Sun pirates, while en route to the planet Rutan. The Imperial Navy refitted a number of them as Imperial Patrol Ships.
